plot: Inside Irvin is a compelling character study in the fragility of the human psyche and the effects of isolation and loneliness on the human spirit. Set in the Los Angeles home of Irvin and Ida Walter.
title: Inside Irvin
plot_es: Inside Irvin is a compelling character study in the fragility of the human psyche and the effects of isolation and loneliness on the human spirit. Set in the Los Angeles home of Irvin and Ida Walter.
plot_en: Inside Irvin is a compelling character study in the fragility of the human psyche and the effects of isolation and loneliness on the human spirit. Set in the Los Angeles home of Irvin and Ida Walter.
